rules_text:
When Shrivelthorn Howler enters, exile up to one target card from a graveyard.
If a creature dealt damage by Shrivelthorn Howler this turn would die, exile it instead.
notes:
Beware the Ulvenwald when the howls go quiet and the leaves turn the color of blood.
